bonus.value: Equipping Precious One, 2 or more weapons of different elements, or 2 or more types of weapons increases all elemental damage by 8%/9%/10%/11%. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
When dealing frost damage, increase all elemental damage by 13%/16%/19%/22% for 25 seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

mind.name: Solipsism
mind.desc: Strategi dan rencana. Takdirku ada di tanganku.

memory.name: Witness
memory.desc: Semua akan menyaksikan ujung jalan ini.

belief.name: Thin Ice
belief.desc: Tetap melangkah meski di atas es yang tipis.

emotion.name: Passerby
emotion.desc: Orang-orang lewat pun datang dan pergi.
